abstract: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
overview:
## Overview

The macOS 13.1 SDK provides support to develop apps for Mac computers running macOS Ventura 13.1. The SDK comes bundled with Xcode 14.2, available from the Mac App Store. For information on the compatibility requirements for Xcode 14.2, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode-Release-Notes/xcode-14_2-release-notes].
